resources.string: You need to log in to add spots or shops to the map
Add a spot or a shop to the map
1/2 Tap on the map\n to add a marker
Select the type of the spot
Tap on the map to add a marker
Are you sure you want to add the spot to the map?
New spot has been successfully submitted for moderation
Come up with a username (it will be displayed in the description of the spots you add, also displayed in the ratings).
The username has been successfully set.
The changes were successfully submitted for moderation
To suggest changes to spots you need to log in to your account
No suitable map application is found on your device. Consider downloading Yandex or Google Maps.
To add spots to your favorites you need to log in to your account
To declare a spot irrelevant you need to log in to your account
To add spots to your favorites you need to log in to your account

General rules:

1) Follow the line for the trick.

2) Don't litter on the spot.

That's Macba on the photo. They clean up the trash there every night, which doesn't happen on all the spots, but the reputation of the riders is ruined. 

3) Don't argue with the guards, in most cases they are just doing their job. You can try to negotiate, but you don't have to be stubborn, rude or ignore them. 

4) Do not skate under the influence of alcohol. This will only reduce the productivity of the sesh and the likelihood of a trick land, but will greatly increase the risk of trauma. 

5) Warm up before session. This reduces the risk of trauma and speeds up the warm-up.
 
6) Don't cut off other riders. 

7) Don't steal a trick that another rider has been trying to land for a long time. It's better to wait a little. 

8) Don't throw the board far away from you in a fit of rage.. 

9) Stay out of the frame / be respectful to riders and their cameramen. 

10) Do not make changes to the dirt tracks on your own. 

11) Don't ride on wet dirt tracks. 


At the skate park:

1) Don't sit on the obstacles

2) Do not go against the natural flow and pattern of the park if it will interfere with other riders. 

3) Do not wax the flat, do not apply too much wax. 

4) Don't skate flat on obstacles' landings / ride-ups. 

5) Do not put the board on a tail stall while someone else is riding in the ramp.
The length of the username cannot exceed 20 characters
Are you sure this spot is irrelevant and should be removed from TrickTrack?
The proposal to remove the spot has been successfully sent for moderation
Choose which spots will be counted in the randoms:
Password must contain a minimum of 7 characters, including Latin letters and numbers
This e-mail address has already been registered
A confirmation email has been sent. Check your inbox
You need to confirm your e-mail address. New email sent
Credentials entered incorrectly or Internet connection is unstable
Enter your e-mail address in the corresponding field
The entered e-mail address is not registered in the app
The password reset email has been sent. Check your inbox.
An error occurred during username verification
Describe your problem or update proposal

The application is still beta, so in case you encounter any bug, you can describe it here and we will fix it promptly. Also, if you have a grand update idea, you can state your suggestion for improvement.
Error sending the message. Try again later
Character limit in title or description exceeded
Translates spots\' titles and descriptions to your language on the go
Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted from the app. Are you sure you want to continue?
